comments.content:

Specimen PDF:  
 [http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/PDF/DTL%20Prokyon%20Presentation.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20130222112226/http:/www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/PDF/DTL%20Prokyon%20Presentation.pdf "http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/PDF/DTL%20Prokyon%20Presentation.pdf")

Oh, I just realized that's actually not the specimen PDF, but a 101 page slide presentation showing the design process. It's interesting too :-)

Cheers!
